moves.4. Bc4 c6 5. dxe5 dxe5 6. Be3 Be7 7. Nc3: It is probably not the right time to attack. Should have played 9. Ng5 to threathen the weak f7 pawn. It also forces 9. ... Nh6 10. h3 to prevent 10. ... Bg4
moves.9... Ne6 10. Rb1 Nf6 11. O-O O-O 12. Ne1: Black threatens the e4 and c6 pawns
moves.26. Nf3 Ne2+ 27. Rxe2 Qxe2 28. Qxe5 Bf6: An astute move seeing that White is trying his last desperate move, to move the white pawn forward.
